name: go-goggles
effect: Allows the trainer to enter the desert on hoenn route 111.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Nifty goggles that protect eyes from desert sandstorms.
flavor_text.emerald: Nifty goggles that protect eyes from desert sandstorms.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A pair of protective goggles. They enable a TRAINER to travel through even desert sandstorms.
